name: MTLScissorRect
desc: A rectangle for the scissor fragment test.

items.name: init(x: Int, y: Int, width: Int, height: Int)
var height: Int
items.desc: The height of the scissor rectangle, in pixels.

items.name: var width: Int
items.desc: The width of the scissor rectangle, in pixels.

items.name: var x: Int
items.desc: The x window coordinate of the upper-left corner of the scissor rectangle.

items.name: var y: Int
items.desc: The y window coordinate of the upper-left corner of the scissor rectangle.
